.. _install:

Installation
============

Dependencies
------------

**arianna** depends on ``matplotlib``, ``numpy``, and optionally ``scipy``.

Using pip
---------

The easiest way to install the most recent stable version of ``arianna`` is
with `pip <http://www.pip-installer.org/>`_:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install arianna


From source
-----------

Alternatively, you can get the source by cloning `the git
repository <https://github.com/minaskar/arianna>`_:

.. code-block:: bash

    git clone https://github.com/minaskar/arianna.git

Once you've downloaded the source, you can navigate into the root source
directory and run:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install .
